nodes.documentation:
@title RootChain
@dev This contract secures a utxo payments plasma child chain to ethereum.
nodes.name: RootChain

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows Plasma chain operator to submit block root.
@param _root The root of a child chain block.
nodes.name: submitBlock

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows anyone to deposit funds into the Plasma chain.
nodes.name: deposit

nodes.documentation: @dev Deposits approved amount of ERC20 token. Approve must be called first. Note: does not check if token was added.
nodes.name: depositFrom
startDepositExit
startFeeExit

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory,uint256) view returns (struct PlasmaRLP.exitingTx memory)

nodes.name: startExit
challengeExit

nodes.documentation:
@dev Processes any exits that have completed the challenge period.
@param _token Token type to process.
nodes.name: finalizeExits

nodes.documentation:
@dev Checks if queue for particular token was created.
@param _token Address of the token.
nodes.name: hasToken
getChildChain

nodes.documentation:
@dev Determines the next deposit block number.
@return Block number to be given to the next deposit block.
nodes.name: getDepositBlock
getExit
getNextExit
writeDepositBlock
addExitToQueue
